text: mekh cheachraen chean staerte bek thleak mk now leu knea(daoy sarphap utdongk utdam robsa a l laoh) . haey mea la ai kat kampoung leukatamkeung daoy sarsaer tow champoh mcheasa robsa puokke ning som pi mcheasa robsa puokke aoy aphytosa dl anak del now leu phendei(anak del mean chomnue) . chaur doeng tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh trong mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
